FuncDef: The mask value and the mask type, along with theoid-valueconfigured in theviewcommand, determines the access of each sub-identifier of an object identifier (MIB subtree) in the view.

ParaDef.Info: The mask value associated with the OID value determines whether the sub-identifiers are included or excluded from the view. (Default: all 1s).
Specifies to include or exclude MIB subtree objects. Values-included - All MIB subtree objects that are identified with a 1 in the mask are available in the view.. ParamDefault: Default- included
